segments.text: we really were lucky . We got the last available table for two---and we didn't even have a reservation ! Did you see the long lines behind us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , I'm glad that we didn't have to wait long . I'm starving !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: let's take a look at the menu so we can order . Do you want to choose an appetizer for us to share ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what would you rather have , samosas or poppadoms ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard that one of their specialities is the samosa .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , let's get a plate of those then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sounds good . What are you going to have for your main course ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I might have a dahl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's got chickpeas and vegetables in a spicy curry sauce with rice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that sounds nice . Do you want to share some kebabs as well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok . How about some lamb kebabs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's my favourite . Do you want to have some wine or beer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'll have a beer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok , shall I flag down the waitress ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn't recommend it . I think we should wait until she comes round .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you're right . That might seem a bit rude . It's a good thing I've got you with me !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what would you do without me ?
segments.speaker: S2
